abstract.t: This document describes a few scenarios where PW redundancy is needed. A set of redundant PWs is configured between PE nodes in SS- PW applications, or between T-PE nodes in MS-PW applications. In order for the PE/T-PE nodes to indicate the preferred PW path to forward to one another, a new status bit is needed to indicate the preferential forwarding status of active or standby for each PW in the redundancy set as defined in [7].
